status.name: Reopened

fields.description: According to the [Human Interface Guidelines|http://developer.apple.com/library/ios/#documentation/userexperience/conceptual/mobilehig/UIElementGuidelines/UIElementGuidelines.html] there is a constant for a SHARE button. I'd like to have access to this button from Titanium
fields.summary: iOS: Add Share button to Titanium.UI.iPhone.SystemButton

comments.body:
This capability has already been implemented via a module. Please refer to: https://marketplace.appcelerator.com/apps/741?443319923

for the iOS ShareKit module.

Regards,
Carter

Reopening this feature request as it is valid one based on Apple's HMI guidelines. Moving it to engineering for further evaluation and prioritization.

Titanium.UI.iPhone.SystemButton needs to be enhanced to add "Share" capability.

Please refer to "Table 35-1 Standard buttons available for toolbars and navigation bars" on the following page for more information on this button.

https://developer.apple.com/library/ios/documentation/userexperience/conceptual/mobilehig/Bars.html#//apple_ref/doc/uid/TP40006556-CH12-SW33
